dmca.title: Homeowners' Hostilities
dmca.body:
Dear Sir,

It has been brought to our attention by your Board of Directors, that a Web site / domain name has been created by you for the Summer Pines Villas Homeowners Association.  This was done without the expressed or written consent of your Board of Directors and will need to be terminated at your earliest convenience.  Please notify our office when this has been accomplished.

Sincerely,
[private]
President, PCI
